dcterms:description: The ISPRS Potsdam dataset consists of 38 high-resolution remote sensing aerial images with a spatial resolution of 5 cm and 4 spectral bands. It is annotated with six classes: low vegetation, trees, buildings, impervious surfaces, cars, and others.
dcterms:title: ISPRS Potsdam Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Demir
K. Koperski
D. Lindenbaum
G. Pang
J. Huang
S. Basu
F. Hughes
D. Tuia
R. Raskar
dcterms:description: The Deep Globe Land Cover Classification dataset provides high-resolution sub-meter satellite images with labels covering seven classes: urban, agriculture, rangeland, forest, water, barren, and unknown.
dcterms:title: Deep Globe Land Cover Classification Dataset (DGLC)

dcterms:description: The Hubei dataset consists of images acquired from the Gaofen-2 satellite covering the Hubei Province of China, with a spatial resolution of 2 m and labels covering 10 classes.
dcterms:title: Hubei Dataset

dcterms:description: The Xiangtan dataset consists of images from the Gaofen-2 satellite covering the city of Xiangtan, China, with higher quality labels than the Hubei dataset, covering 9 classes.
dcterms:title: Xiangtan Dataset
